Sentencas: A few compositions of La doped strontium titanate, LaxSr1-xTiO3-delta (x = 0.0, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, and 0.4) were synthesized via solid state reaction route.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The XRD patterns of the compositions with x <= 0.2 showed single phase whereas for x >= 0.3 compositions, secondary phases were observed.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The Rietveld refinement of the XRD data for all compositions indicated cubic structure with space group Pm (3) over barm at room temperature.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The SEM micrographs for x = 0.0 showed large grains, whereas the compositions with 0.0 < x <= 0.2 showed small grains and for x >= 0.3, irregular morphologies with porosity were observed.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The conductivity spectra of the investigated systems were described using Jonscher's power law.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The scaling behaviour of the systems was understood through Ghosh scaling model.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The scaling properties showed that the conduction mechanism is independent of temperature.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: A systematic study of conduction mechanism of the system revealed that conduction mechanism is changing from small polaron hopping to large polaron hopping as the composition changes from x = 0.0 to x = 0.1.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: The large polaron hopping has also been confirmed through Modulus spectroscopy and Photoluminiscence analysis in lanthanum substituted samples.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate

Sentencas: Further, the observed change in conduction mechanism was correlated with the hopping polaron size and lattice parameter.
Titulo: Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate
Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate
Large polaron hopping phenomenon in lanthanum doped strontium titanate
